title: Hide and Seek
desc:
Post 2161
*"Ding dong, Here I come to find you, Hurry up and run! Let's play a little game and have fun..."*
**Chain Break:** Someone attempts to play a card that would be impossible to play.
**While the chain is active:** <:gloom:1187518684143550605>, <:black:1106265022453268530>, <:red:1106234051129507932>, <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>, <:gray:1107516393450127411>, and <:purple:1106247148607131711> cards can be played on ⛓️. Cards people play, (not including this one) are not seen, and the card pile is invisible.
- If someone breaks the chain, they must draw 3 cards.
- On a player's turn, they may ask a single yes/no question about the card pile to learn what cards they might be able to play.
